Journeyman.title: Journeyman AFK (~40)
Journeyman.notes: This build is for leveling, and ignores all of the utility talents that provide help with drops and cash

tabs.name: Beginner
tabs.note: *1 = As much as you need accuracy for the zone you want to afk in. Check your AFK Info window or mob cards to find the acc requirements.

tabs.name: Journeyman
tabs.note: Two Punch Man and Combat Skills effect AFK gain.

Journeyman.title: Journeyman AFK (~55)
Journeyman.notes: This build is for leveling, and ignores all of the utility talents that provide help with drops and cash

tabs.name: Beginner
tabs.note: *1 = As much as you need accuracy for the zone you want to afk in. Check your AFK Info window or mob cards to find the acc requirements.

tabs.name: Journeyman
tabs.note: Two Punch Man and Combat Skills effect AFK gains.

Journeyman.title: Journeyman AFK (~70)
Journeyman.notes: This build is for leveling, and ignores all of the utility talents that provide help with drops and cash.

tabs.name: Beginner
tabs.note:
Journeyman has 4 talents that impact damage in tab 1. Once you get those maxed, it is up to you what you want - you can go for HP/defense for survivability, movespeed, etc. 
 Accuracy shouldn't be an issue anymore at this point. Use cards and/or upgrade Shaq bubble if you need more.

tabs.name: Journeyman
tabs.note:
Max Two Punch Man and Indiana Attack. Then, points can be placed into Lucky Hit.
*1 Excess points into Lucky Horseshoe.
*2 Excess points can instead be placed into non-combat bonuses, depending on what you're looking for.

Maestro.title: Maestro Skilling (~100)
Maestro.notes: This build is created to level Maestro's skills as quickly as possible.

tabs.name: Beginner
tabs.note:
Place as many points as you can into Happy Dude. Getting 300+ will require upgrading Bliss n Chips from Tab 3. 
1* Once Happy Dude is maximally upgraded, the rest of Tab 1 is used for improving skill efficiency in a particular skill.

tabs.name: Journeyman
tabs.note:
Place points into It's your Birthday! for some gems. Then put 100 into Mr Looty Booty and Rares Everywhere for higher statue drop.
*2 Excess points can be placed points into F'luk'ey Fabrics and Lucky Horseshoe for LUK to increase droprate.
*1 If you need cards, you can use cards galore.

tabs.name: Maestro
tabs.note:
Use the Library to place 100+ into Bliss n Chips. 
1* Extra points can go into here to increase EhExPee Statue (+% Skill Exp)
*2 If the Eff drop is not a big deal, you can place points into Transfusion. This will also increase the EXP gained from balloons.
*3 Excess points can go into Left/Right hand to help your other skillers.
*4 Excess points can be put into Printer Go Brrr

Maestro.title: Maestro Skilling: Left + Right Hands (~100)
Maestro.notes: The goal of this build is to allow your other characters to get level 20+ on their non-specialized skills. The focus is not to level Maestro's skill. However, it's expected Maestro will be skilling using this build.

tabs.name: Beginner
tabs.note:
For the first tab, place as many points as you can into Happy Dude. Getting 300+ will require upgrading Bliss n Chips from Tab 3. 
1* Once Happy Dude is maximally upgraded, the rest of Tab 1 is used for improving skill efficiency in a particular skill.

tabs.name: Journeyman
tabs.note:
Place points into It's your Birthday! for some gems. Then put 100 into Mr Looty Booty and Rares Everywhere for higher statue drop.
*2 Excess points can be placed points into F'luk'ey Fabrics and Lucky Horseshoe for LUK to increase droprate.
*1 If you need cards, you can use cards galore.

tabs.name: Maestro
tabs.note:
Place points into Left Hand of Learning and Right Hand of Action. Once those are maxed, put 100+ into Bliss n Chips. 
1* Extra points can go into here to increase EhExPee Statue (+% Skill Exp)
*2 If the Eff drop is not a big deal, you can place points into Transfusion. This will also increase the EXP gained from balloons.

tabs.name: Beginner
tabs.note:
Max Gilded Sword and Sharpened Axe. Then place 100 points into Sleeping' On The Job.
*1 For more droprate, EXP, and damage, excess points can be placed into "Lucky Clover" or "Happy Dude".

tabs.name: Journeyman
tabs.note:
Max Two Punch Man and Indiana Attack. Then, points can be placed into Lucky Hit.
*1 Excess points split between F'luk'ey Fabrics and Lucky Horseshoe.
*2 Excess points can instead be placed into non-combat bonuses, depending on what you're looking for.

tabs.name: Maestro
tabs.note:
Place 100 into Coin Toss, then Triple Jab.
*1 Jman Was Better if you need more Tab 2 points.
*2 Excess points can go into Lucky Charms for EXP or Skillage Damage for more Damage.

tabs.name: Beginner
tabs.note:
Max Gilded Sword and Sharpened Axe. Then place 100 points into Lucky Clover.
*1 Excess points can go to Feather Flight.

tabs.name: Journeyman
tabs.note:
Max Two Punch Man and Indiana Attack. Then, points can be placed into Lucky Hit.
*1 Excess points split between F'luk'ey Fabrics and Lucky Horseshoe.
*2 Excess points can instead be placed into non-combat bonuses, depending on what you're looking for.

tabs.name: Maestro
tabs.note:
Place 100 into Triple Jab, then Coin Toss. Place 1 point into Crystal Countdown.
*1 Jman Was Better if you need more Tab 2 points.
*2 Excess points can go into Lucky Charms for EXP or Skillage Damage for more Damage.

Maestro.title: Maestro Active - Crystal Cards (~70)
Maestro.notes: The goal of this build is to farm Crystal Cards

tabs.name: Beginner
tabs.note:
Max Gilded Sword and Sharpened Axe. Then place 100 points into Feather Flight.
*1 For more damage, excess points can go into Knucklebuster.
*2 For more droprate and EXP, points can be placed into Lucky Clover.

tabs.name: Journeyman
tabs.note:
Max Cmon Out Crystals, and Two Punch Man. Then max Gimme Gimme.
*1 Excess points can go into Cards Galore.

tabs.name: Maestro
tabs.note:
Place 1 point into Crystal Countdown. The skill is bugged, so you do not want to level it further. Place 100 into Triple Jab, then Skillage Damage.
*1 Excess poitns can go into Lucky Charms.

Maestro.title: Maestro / AFK / Money (170)
Maestro.notes: This build heavily relies on how many talent points you have. Go for the regular afk build if you do not have those points or need that much money.

tabs.name: Beginner
tabs.note: *1 If you need Survivability.

tabs.name: Journeyman
tabs.note: *1 Max this talents and use it after your afk claim, before you pick up your items from the ground.

tabs.name: Beginner
tabs.note: *1 If you need Survivability. Assign unused points in AGI and WIS for gains in Smithing and Alchemy.

tabs.name: Journeyman
tabs.note: *1 Use this talent after your afk claim, before you pick up your items from the ground.

tabs.name: Maestro
tabs.note: *1 Use hand buffs as needed.

tabs.name: Rage_Basics
tabs.note: Place points into Brute Efficiency, and then Idle Skilling. Excess points can be used to max Brute Efficiency.

tabs.name: Warrior
tabs.note: Place 1 point into Firmly Grasp It. Then place points into "Big Pick". Afterwards, equally upgrade Motherlode Miner and Copper Collector.

Warrior.title: Warrior / Active (~35)
Warrior.notes: That's how your build should roughly look when pushing for subclass.

tabs.name: Rage_Basics
tabs.note:
*1 = As much as you need to reach the farthest monster zone. Your goal is to reach Crabcakes to choose your subclass. For gaining levels, Sticks is a great farming zone.
After improving Accuracy prioritise "Sharpened axe" > "Gilded Sword" > "Meatshank"

tabs.name: Warrior
tabs.note:
Put 1 points into each active skill then max "Carry a Big Stick".
*1 = Excess points can go into Double Strike up to 41 PTS.
 1 point into "Firmly Grasp It" gives extra STR.

Warrior.title: Warrior / AFK (~35)
Warrior.notes: That's how your build should roughly look when pushing for subclass.

tabs.name: Rage_Basics
tabs.note:
*1 = As much as you need to reach the farthest monster zone. Your goal is to reach Crabcakes to choose your subclass. For gaining levels, Sticks is a great farming zone.
After improving Accuracy prioritise "Sharpened axe" > "Gilded Sword" > "Meatshank"

tabs.name: Warrior
tabs.note:
Level "Carry a Big Stick" to 50, then your active damage skills to 20. Afterwards, bring "Double Strike" up to 10. Excess points can be used to level "Carry A Big Stick" past 50.
1 point into "Firmly Grasp It" gives extra STR.

tabs.name: Rage_Basics
tabs.note:
Place points into Brute Efficiency, and then Idle Skilling.
*1 Excess points can be placed into STR.

tabs.name: Warrior
tabs.note: Place 1 point into Firmly Grasp It. Then place points into "Big Pick". Afterwards, equally upgrade Motherlode Miner and Copper Collector.

tabs.name: Barbarian
tabs.note:
Max Back to Basics.
*1 Excess points go into Strongest Statues.

Barbarian.title: Mining Active / AFK (Barb) 100+
Barbarian.notes: Use Icing Ironbites, Golden Peanuts and Life Potions. Mining Event food should generally be preserved for sampling. Do not level your mining skill higher than your MMan's mining skill.

tabs.name: Rage_Basics
tabs.note:
Max Brute Efficiency, Idle Skilling, Health Booster, and Fist Of Rage in that order.
*1 Any left over points can go into LUK to improve Droprate.

tabs.name: Warrior
tabs.note:
Max Big Pick, Copper Collector, Tool Proficiency, and Motherlode Miner.
*1 Excess points can go into Firmly Grasp it or Absolute Unit for more Str.
*2 Points can also go into HP
*3 If you need EXP, you can level Tempestuous Emotions, do not use this after you reach the highest available tool, so your Mining sill won't over take your Mman's.

tabs.name: Barbarian
tabs.note: Max Back to Basics, Strongest Statues and STR Summore in that order. If you are using Obols with STR and have left over points, level Fistful of Obol as well.

tabs.name: Rage_Basics
tabs.note:
Place points into Brute Efficiency, and then Idle Skilling.
*1 Excess points can be placed into STR.

tabs.name: Warrior
tabs.note:
Maxing "Absolute Unit" and "Firmly Grasp it" for efficiency.
*1 Excess points can be place into "Tempestous Emotions" for extra xp.

tabs.name: Barbarian
tabs.note:
Max "Worming Undercover". Then place points into "Catching some ZZZ's"
*1 Boost it to around your minigame score.

Barbarian.title: Fishing Active / AFK (Barb) 100+
Barbarian.notes: Do not level your fishing skill higher than your MMan's fishing skill.

tabs.name: Rage_Basics
tabs.note:
Max Brute Efficiency, Fist of Rage, and Idle Skilling in that order.
*1 Leftover points can be put into LUK, AGI or WIS.

tabs.name: Warrior
tabs.note: Max Firmly Grasp It, Absolute Unit and Tempestuous Emotions in that order. Points can also be put into 'Str'ess Tested Garb if more STR is desired.

tabs.name: Barbarian
tabs.note:
Max Worming Undercover, STR Summore, Strongest Statues, All Fish Diet and Catching Some ZZZ's.
*1 Level it up to your minigame score 
*2 Excess can be used to improve STR.

tabs.name: Rage_Basics
tabs.note:
*1 = Boost WIS to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected.
After improving Accuracy prioritise "Sharpened axe" > "Gilded Sword" > "Meatshank"

tabs.name: Warrior
tabs.note:
Put 1 points into each active skill then max "Carry a Big Stick". Then, place 41 points into Double Strike.
*1 = Spread excess points equally between "Absolute Unit" and "Strength in Numbers". 
1 point into "Firmly Grasp It" gives extra STR.

tabs.name: Barbarian
tabs.note:
Put 1 point in every active skill, then 100 into "Back To Basics".
*1 = Excess points can be used to level active skills.

tabs.name: Rage_Basics
tabs.note:
*1 = Boost WIS to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected.
After improving Accuracy prioritise "Sharpened axe" > "Gilded Sword" > "Meatshank"
*2 = Excess points into STR for damage.

tabs.name: Warrior
tabs.note:
Put 1 points into each active skill then max "Carry a Big Stick". Then, place 41 points into Double Strike.
*1 = Spread excess points equally between "Absolute Unit" and "Strength in Numbers".
*2 = Excess points can be placed here for better mob clear. Place up to 26 points.
1 point into "Firmly Grasp It" gives extra STR.

tabs.name: Barbarian
tabs.note:
Put 1 point in every active skill, then 100 into "Back To Basics".
*1 = Excess points can be used to level active skills.
*2 = If you have reached World 3 and unlocked the Death Note, start preparing for "Apocalypse Zow". Have 5 mobs at 100k kills by level 85-90. Once that's done, place excess points into ZOW instead of active skills. If you are ready to start progress on ZOW, you will need to respec into a ZOW build. There is an example of a LVL 85 Barbarian ZOW build in the builds list.

Barbarian.title: Barbarian / Active (~85)
Barbarian.notes: 100+ = Checkout books for these talents from the library.

tabs.name: Rage_Basics
tabs.note:
*1 = Boost WIS to have as much accuracy as you need for the zone you're farming in.
*2 = After maxing damage talents, go for HP to boost "Meatshank" bonus

tabs.name: Warrior
tabs.note:
*60 After maxing "Carry a Big Stick", place excess points into "Absolute Unit" and level it above 60. 
*1 = The rest of the excess points go into HP to try and improve "Meatshank" bonus.

tabs.name: Barbarian
tabs.note:
Put 1 point in every active skill. Max "Apocalypse Zow" (To either 99 or 132, level in-between are useless), then 100 into "Back To Basics".
*1 = Excess points can be split between the two active skills.

Barbarian.title: Barbarian / Active ZOW Farming (~85)
Barbarian.notes: The goal of this build is to get as many Zow stacks as fast you can.

tabs.name: Rage_Basics
tabs.note: *1 = Boost your WIS to reliably hit every mob up to the end of World 2. After maxing dmg talents you want to go for hp talents, to boost "Meatshank" bonus

tabs.name: Warrior
tabs.note:
After maxing damage talents you want to go for hp talents, to boost "Meatshank" bonus
*41 = After you get minimum damage high enough to 1 shot the mob your farming, move these points to %HP

tabs.name: Barbarian
tabs.note:
Max "Monster Decimator" and "Back to Basics", then put points into active skills.
*1 = Max it around 5 "Apocalypse zow" procs
*20 = Max this after maxing Zow

Barbarian.title: Barbarian / Active (~100)
Barbarian.notes: 100+ = Checkout books for these talents from the library.

tabs.name: Rage_Basics
tabs.note:
*1 = Boost WIS to have as much accuracy as you need for the zone you're farming in. 
*2 = After maxing damage talents, go for HP to boost "Meatshank" bonus.

tabs.name: Warrior
tabs.note: *1 = Excess points go into HP to try and improve "Meatshank" bonus.

tabs.name: Barbarian
tabs.note:
Put 1 point in every active skill. Max "Apocalypse Zow" (To either 99 or 132, levels in-between are useless), then 100 into "Back To Basics".
*1 = Excess points can be split between the two active skills.
*2 = Points can also go into "Monster Decimator" for "Apocalypse Zow".

Barbarian.title: Barbarian / AFK (~50)
Barbarian.notes: Active Skills act as a multiplyer to your total dmg for afk. lvl 25 on all of them should be enough to reach dmg cap.

tabs.name: Rage_Basics
tabs.note:
*1 = Boost WIS to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains.
"Idle Brawling" to 50 for 10% AFK gain rate.

tabs.name: Warrior
tabs.note:
Level "Carry A Big Stick" to 60, then your active damage skills to 25. 
 1 point into "Firmly Grasp It" gives extra STR. 
 Excess points can be used to level "Carry A Big Stick" past 60.

tabs.name: Barbarian
tabs.note:
Level "Bear Strike" and "Axe hurl" to around 25.
*1 = You can put some points into "Back to Basics" if you're lacking points on Tab 2.

Barbarian.title: Barbarian / AFK (~70)
Barbarian.notes: Active Skills act as a multiplyer to your total dmg for afk.  Put more points into attack talents and "Double Strike" if you are using Prayers that increase mob hp.

tabs.name: Rage_Basics
tabs.note:
*1 = Boost WIS to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected.
"Idle Brawling" to 50 for 10% AFK gain rate.,

tabs.name: Warrior
tabs.note:
Level "Carry A Big Stick" to 100, then your active damage skills to 25. Afterwards, bring "Double-Strike" up to 41. 
 1 point into "Firmly Grasp It" gives extra STR. 
*1 = Spread excess points equally between "Absolute Unit" and "Strength In Numbers".

tabs.name: Barbarian
tabs.note:
Level "Bear Strike" and "Axe hurl" to 30 and 25.
*1 = You can put some points into "Back to Basics" if you're lacking points on Tab 2.
 *2 Be carefull with NPNG as it reduces your survivability.

Barbarian.title: Barbarian / AFK (~150)
Barbarian.notes: Active Skills act as a multiplyer to your total dmg for afk. lvl 25 on all of them should be enough to reach dmg cap. Put more points into attack talents and "Double Strike" if you are using Prayers that increase mob hp.

tabs.name: Rage_Basics
tabs.note: *1 = Boost WIS to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains.*2 Assign points to increase survivability. *3 Boost AGI for smithing gains if you have the points.

tabs.name: Warrior
tabs.note: Please read main description below.

tabs.name: Barbarian
tabs.note:
Put multiples of 33 into ZOW. Max at 132.
*1 = You can put some points into "Back to Basics" if you're lacking points on Tab 2. 
 NPNG will reduce your survivability you make up for this with food.
 MONSTER DECIMATOR works for zow, monster samples and deathnote.

tabs.name: Rage_Basics
tabs.note: Place points into Brute Efficiency, and then Idle Skilling. Excess points can be used to max Brute Efficiency.

tabs.name: Warrior
tabs.note: Place 1 point into Firmly Grasp It. Then place points into "Big Pick". Afterwards, equally upgrade Motherlode Miner and Copper Collector.

tabs.name: Squire
tabs.note:
Max Back to Basics.
*1 Excess points go into Shieldiest Statues.

tabs.name: Rage_Basics
tabs.note:
Max Brute Efficiency, Idle Skilling, Health Booster, and Fist Of Rage in that order.
*1 Any left over points can go into LUK to improve Droprate.

tabs.name: Warrior
tabs.note:
Max Big Pick, Copper Collector, Tool Proficiency, and Motherlode Miner.
*1 Excess points can go into Firmly Grasp it or Absolute Unit for more Str.
*2 Points can also go into HP
*3 If you need EXP, you can level Tempestuous Emotions

tabs.name: Squire
tabs.note:
Max Back to Basics and Shieldiest Statues.
*1 Excess points can be placed into construction skills.
*2 Points can be placed into STR Summore for more Eff.
*3 If you are using Obols with STR and have left over points, you can Fistful of Obol as well.

tabs.name: Warrior
tabs.note: 11>12>14>13>3>5/8>9(gold food if you have plenty of golden peanuts and jam

tabs.name: Rage_Basics
tabs.note:
*1 = Boost WIS to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected.
After improving Accuracy prioritise "Sharpened axe" > "Gilded Sword" > "Meatshank"

tabs.name: Warrior
tabs.note:
Put 1 points into each active skill then max "Carry a Big Stick". Then, place 41 points into Double Strike.
*1 = Spread excess points equally between "Absolute Unit" and "Strength in Numbers". 
1 point into "Firmly Grasp It" gives extra STR.

tabs.name: Squire
tabs.note:
Put 1 point in every active skill, then 100 into "Back To Basics".
*1 = Excess points can be used to level "Precision Power". If you level this talent, be sure to have 1.5x the 100% hit chance requirement when killing the monster you're farming. This skill will do nothing under the 1.5x requirement. You may need to put more points into "Book of the Wise" on Tab 1.

tabs.name: Rage_Basics
tabs.note:
*1 = Boost WIS to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected.
After improving Accuracy prioritise "Sharpened axe" > "Gilded Sword" > "Meatshank"
*2 = Excess points into STR for damage.

tabs.name: Warrior
tabs.note:
Put 1 points into each active skill then max "Carry a Big Stick". Then, place 41 points into Double Strike.
*1 = Spread excess points equally between "Absolute Unit" and "Strength in Numbers".
*2 = Excess points can be placed here for better mob clear. Place up to 26 points.
1 point into "Firmly Grasp It" gives extra STR.

tabs.name: Squire
tabs.note:
Put 1 point in every active skill, then 100 into "Back To Basics".
*1 = Excess points can be used to level "Precision Power". If you level this talent, be sure to have 1.5x the 100% hit chance requirement when killing the monster you're farming. This skill will do nothing under the 1.5x requirement. You may need to put more points into "Book of the Wise" on Tab 1.
*2 = Extra points can be placed here for better mob clear.

Squire.title: Squire / AFK (~50)
Squire.notes: Active Skills act as a multiplyer to your total dmg for afk.

tabs.name: Rage_Basics
tabs.note:
*1 = Boost WIS to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected.
Priority switches to Gilded sword > Meatshank > Sharpened axe

tabs.name: Warrior
tabs.note:
Level "Carry A Big Stick" to 60, then your active damage skills to 55. Excess points can be used to level "Carry A Big Stick" past 60.
 1 point into "Firmly Grasp It" gives extra STR.

tabs.name: Squire
tabs.note:
Level "Shockwave Slash" and "Daggerang" to around 30.
*1 = You can put some points into "Back to Basics" if you're lacking points on Tab 2.

Squire.title: Squire / AFK (~70)
Squire.notes: Active Skills directly increase AFK kills/hr.

tabs.name: Rage_Basics
tabs.note:
*1 = Boost WIS to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected.
Priority switches to Gilded sword > Meatshank > Sharpened axe

tabs.name: Warrior
tabs.note:
Level "Carry A Big Stick" to 100, then your active damage skills to 55.
*1 = Spread excess points equally between "Absolute Unit" and "Strength In Numbers".
 1 point into "Firmly Grasp It" gives extra STR.

tabs.name: Squire
tabs.note:
Level "Shockwave Slash" and "Daggerang" to around 30.
*1 = You can put some points into "Back to basics" if you're lacking points on tab 2.
*2 If you have the required acc lvl this.

Squire.title: Squire / AFK (~150)
Squire.notes: Active Skills directly increase AFK kills/hr.

tabs.name: Rage_Basics
tabs.note:
*1 = Boost WIS to have 150% of required accuracy needed for your current enemy. 
 *2 Put points here for Survivability. 
 *3 Dump unused points here for smithing gains and ms.

tabs.name: Warrior
tabs.note: Put more points into attack talents and "Double Strike" if you are using Prayers that increase mob hp.

tabs.name: Squire
tabs.note:
Put more points into attack talents if you are using Prayers that increase mob hp. 
 If you do not have lvl 160 "Refinery Trottle" put multiple of 8 into it. 
 *1 lvl super samples if you can reach 90% sample rate with it without Sample Prayer.

Archer.title: Archer / AFK (~35)
Archer.notes: That's how your build should roughly look when pushing for subclass.

tabs.name: Calm_Basics
tabs.note:
*1 = As much as you need to reach the farthest monster zone. Your goal is to reach Crabcakes to choose your subclass. For gaining levels, Sticks is a great farming zone.
After improving Accuracy prioritise "Sharpened axe" > "Gilded Sword", keep them within 10 levels of each other.

tabs.name: Archer
tabs.note: Level "Polymer Limbs" to 50, active damage skills to 20, and then 1 value point into "Strafe". Activate it before going offline. Afterwards, level up "Have Another" to 10. Excess points can be used to level "Polymer Limbs" past 50.

Bowman.title: Catching Active / AFK 50+
Bowman.notes: Only use Buttered Toasted Butter if you can afford it.

tabs.name: Calm_Basics
tabs.note:
Max out both "Elusive efficiency"  and "Quickness boots"
*1- you can invest into "Broken time" with excess points.

tabs.name: Archer
tabs.note:
Max "Sanic speed" to boost "Briar Patch Runner" on tab 3
*1 Rest of the points are placed into "Garb of Un'AGI'ng Quality". 
*2 Excess points can be placed into "Focused Soul" for xp gains

tabs.name: Bowman
tabs.note:
Place points into Teleki'Net'Ic Logs. Then put points into Briar Patch Runner
*1 Excess points can be placed into Bug Enthusiastic and Sunset on the Hives

Bowman.title: Catching Active / AFK 70+
Bowman.notes:
With around 100k oak logs + ~400 agi you'll be able to catch fruitflies, but at very slow rate. 
 Use Buttered Toasted Butter. Do not level your catching skill higher than your MMan's Catching skill.

tabs.name: Calm_Basics
tabs.note:
Max out both "Elusive efficiency"  and "Quickness boots"
*1- you can invest into "Broken time" with excess points.

tabs.name: Archer
tabs.note:
Max "Sanic speed" and "Garb of Un'AGI'ng Quality" to boost "Briar patch runner on tab 3
"Focused Soul" for xp gains

tabs.name: Bowman
tabs.note:
You have ability to invest into 3 efficiency skills overall, "Briar patch runner" and "Teleki'Net'ic" are both great sources of that.
Consider maxing out "Sunset on Hives" for more afk  gains, "Bug enthusiast" is for speeding up xp gain.

Bowman.title: Catching Active / AFK 100+
Bowman.notes: Use Buttered Toasted Butter. Do not level your catching skill higher than your Mman's Catching skill. Godly Creation on 2nd tab can be used if you got enough points to max everything else and wish to gamble for its bonus.

tabs.name: Calm_Basics
tabs.note: Max Elusive Efficiency, Quickness Boots, and Broken Time in that order. Extra Points can go into LUK and WIS.

tabs.name: Archer
tabs.note:
Max Sanic Speed, Garb Of Un'AGI'ing Quality and Focused Soul in that order. 
 *1 ACME Anvil should be maxed on this preset. *2 Extra points can go into Robbinghood for rare drops. Yea I Already Know doesn't work on catching right now but it still helps with smithing lvls.

tabs.name: Bowman
tabs.note:
Max Sunset On The Hives, Briar Patch Runner, Teleki'net'ic Logs, Swifty Statues, AGI Again and Shoeful Of Obol.
Extra points can go into Previous Points.

tabs.name: Calm_Basics
tabs.note:
*1 = Boost STR to have as much accuracy as you need. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected. 
 Bowman's core concept is "SpeedNA", gives damage based on every 15% movement speed so we're aiming for 130% or ideally with spare points, 145% with "Featherweight" & "Strafe". Priority is "Featherweight" to 5-20 > "Gilded sword" > "Sharpened Axe"

tabs.name: Archer
tabs.note:
Put 1 point into the active skills, then max "High Polymer Limbs" . 
 *1 = Level up "Strafe" to achieve 130% movement speed with points into featherweight into tab 1. This should be around 40 points. 
 Excess points can be used to level "Have Another".

tabs.name: Bowman
tabs.note:
Put 1 point into active skills, then get speedNA up to 70-90. 
 *1 = Points can be invested back into tab 2 if necessary. Eventually you want to aim for 145% MS. 50 points into Strafe would add another 15% MS for another "SpeedNA" bonus.

tabs.name: Calm_Basics
tabs.note:
*1 = Boost STR to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected. 
 Bowman's core concept is "SpeedNA", gives damage based on every 15% movement speed so we're aiming for 145% with "Featherweight" & "Strafe". 
 Priority is "Featherweight" to 20, then "Gilded Sword" > "Sharpened Axe". Excess points may be placed into Agi or "Broken Time".

tabs.name: Archer
tabs.note:
Put 1 point into the active skills, then max "High Polymer Limbs" followed by 50 points into "Have Another" & 20 into "Veins of the Infernal". 
 *1 = Level up "Strafe" to achieve 145% movement speed with points into "Featherweight" into tab 1. This should be around 85 points.

tabs.name: Bowman
tabs.note:
Put 1 point into active skills, then get speedNA maxed. 
 Points will be invested back into tab 2 for "Strafe" to aim for 145% MS.

tabs.name: Calm_Basics
tabs.note:
*1 = Boost STR to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected. 
 Bowman's core concept is "SpeedNA", gives damage based on every 15% movement speed so we're aiming for 145% with "Featherweight" & "Strafe". 
 Priority is "Featherweight" to 20, then "Gilded Sword" > "Sharpened Axe". *2 = Excess points may be placed into HP/Def/"Broken Time" or Agi.

tabs.name: Archer
tabs.note:
Level 40 "Piercing Arrow" to be able to hit 3 mobs, and 1 point into kick. Max "High Polymer Limbs" followed by 50 points into "Have Another" & 100 into "Veins of the Infernal". 
 *1 = Level up "Strafe" to achieve 145% movement speed with points into "Featherweight" into tab 1. This should be around 85 points. 
 *2 = Excess points may be put into HP/MP, Smithing EXP, or more Agi.

tabs.name: Bowman
tabs.note:
Put 1 point into active skills, then get speedNA maxed. 
 Points will be invested back into tab 2 for "Strafe" to aim for 145% MS. Excess points may be used for "Homing Arrow" for bossing, or "Extendo Range" to reach required accuracy.

Bowman.title: Bowman / AFK (~50)
Bowman.notes:
Active Skills act as a multiplyer to your total dmg for afk. 
  If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected. 
 Dmg for Bowman comes from "Speed DNA" and "Vines of the Infernal". Raise your Smithing lvl by produceing 2/3x thread.

tabs.name: Calm_Basics
tabs.note:
*1 = Boost STR to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. 
"Idle Shooting" to 50 for 10% AFK gain rate. 
 Bowman's core concept is "SpeedNA" gives damage based on every 15% movement speed so we're aiming for 130% with "Featherweight" & "Strafe". Priority is "Featherweight" to 5-20 > "Gilded Sword" > "Sharpened Axe".

tabs.name: Archer
tabs.note:
Level "Polymer Limbs" to 50, then your active skills. 
 *1 = Level up "Strafe" to achieve 130% movement speed with points into featherweight into tab 1. This should be around 40 points. 
 Excess points go into "Veins of the Infernal".

tabs.name: Bowman
tabs.note:
Level up "Homing Arrow" and "Magic Shortbow" to 50 and 25. Value point into "Extendo Rangeo" for that sweet 3 accuracy. Activate before AFK. 
 Then raise "SpeedNA" to 40+.

Bowman.title: Bowman / AFK (~70)
Bowman.notes:
Active Skills act as a multiplyer to your total dmg for afk.
 Activate Strafe and Extendo Rango before AFK. 
 Dmg for Bowman comes from "Speed DNA" and "Vines of the Infernal". Raise your Smithing lvl by produceing 2/3x thread.

tabs.name: Calm_Basics
tabs.note:
*1 = Boost STR to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected. 
"Idle Shooting" to 50 for 10% AFK gain rate. 
 Bowman's core concept is "SpeedNA" gives damage based on every 15% movement speed so we're aiming for 130% with "Featherweight" & "Strafe", or ideally 145%. Priority is "Featherweight" to 5-20 > "Gilded Sword" & "Sharpened Axe".

tabs.name: Archer
tabs.note:
Level "Polymer Limbs" to 100, then your active damage skills. Afterwards, level up "Veins of the Infernal" to 30. 
 *1 Level up "Strafe" to achieve 130% movement speed with points into featherweight into tab 1. This should be around 40 points.

tabs.name: Bowman
tabs.note:
Level up "Homing Arrow" and "Magic Shortbow" to 50 and 25. Value point into "Extendo Rangeo" for that sweet 4 accuracy. 
 Then raise "SpeedNA" to 60. 
 *1 Points can be invested back into tab 2. Eventually you want to aim for 145% MS. 50 points into Strafe would add another 15% MS for another "SpeedNA" bonus.

Bowman.title: Bowman / AFK (~90)
Bowman.notes:
Active Skills act as a multiplyer to your total dmg for afk. 
 Activate Strafe and Extendo Rango before AFK. 
 Dmg for Bowman comes from "Speed DNA" and "Vines of the Infernal". Raise your Smithing lvl by produceing 2/3x thread.

tabs.name: Calm_Basics
tabs.note:
*1 = Boost STR to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected. 
"Idle Shooting" to 100 for 13% AFK gain rate. 
 Bowman's core concept is "SpeedNA" gives damage based on every 15% movement speed so we're aiming for 145% with "Featherweight" & "Strafe". Priority is "Featherweight" to 20 > "Gilded Sword" & "Sharpened Axe". 
 *2 = Excess points may go here.

tabs.name: Archer
tabs.note:
Try to reach "100 + multiple of 15" movement speed ( 115%, 130%, 145%, etc.) 
 *1 Assing points here for Survivability.

tabs.name: Bowman
tabs.note:
*1 Put points into extendo so you need less acc from tab 1. 
 *2 Excess points here.

Bowman.title: Bowman Boss Killer
Bowman.notes: This build works best with 4 movement speed food, Boost food effect: cards/Yum Yum Desert set/PO box and King of Food trophy. If you have only 3 ms food I'd use boss card set.

tabs.name: Calm_Basics
tabs.note: Library order: Gilded>Sharpened>Featherweigh(not possible atm)> Agi> I see you

tabs.name: Archer
tabs.note: Library order: High Polymer Limbs>Strafe>Veins>Sanic Speed>Garb of Un'AGI'ng Quality

tabs.name: Bowman
tabs.note: Library order: SpeeDNA>Homing arrows>Agi again>Schwifty statues>Shoeful of obols

Bowman.title: Bowman / AFK (~150)
Bowman.notes: Active Skills act as a multiplyer to your total dmg for afk. lvl 25 on all of them should be enough to reach dmg cap. Put more points into attack talents and "Have Another!" if you are using Prayers that increase mob hp.

tabs.name: Calm_Basics
tabs.note: Level WIS and STR after you max other talents. Featherweight falls off heavily at high lvl max it out last. *1 If you need Survivability

tabs.name: Archer
tabs.note:
*1 Assign points here for Survivability. 
 *2 Excess points here to help with forge. 
 *3 Put points here instead of Garb of Unaging if your gear is bad. 
 *4 Points here for faster Townskill lvls (due to a bug).

tabs.name: Bowman
tabs.note: *1 Level this last as you will level Featherweight last. *2 Aaccuracy should not be a problem anymore apply points here if it is.

tabs.name: Calm_Basics
tabs.note: Max Elusive Efficiency, and then Quickness Boots for agility.

tabs.name: Archer
tabs.note:
Put points into Sanic Speed, then Garb of Un'agi'in quality. Then max Focused Soul for EXP gain.
*1 Excess points can be used to max ACME Anvil.
*2 The rest of the points can be split between Yeah I Already Know and Godly Creation

tabs.name: Hunter
tabs.note:
Put 100+ points into Eagle Eye, and then Shroom Bait.
*1 Excess points can be split between Invasive Species and Reflextice Eyesight

tabs.name: Calm_Basics
tabs.note: Max Elusive Efficiency. Use Tab 3 to get Quickness boots to 200 after maxing Trapping Talents.

tabs.name: Archer
tabs.note:
Put points into Sanic Speed, then Garb of Un'agi'in quality. Then max Focused Soul for EXP gain.
*1 Excess points can be used to max ACME Anvil.
*2 The rest of the points can be split between Yeah I Already Know and Godly Creation

tabs.name: Hunter
tabs.note:
Put 100+ points into each Trapping skill.
*1 Excess points to go Agi Again to level Quickness Boots on Tab 1.

tabs.name: Calm_Basics
tabs.note:
*1 = Boost STR to have as much accuracy as you need. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected. 
 Priority is "Gilded sword" > "Sharpened Axe"

tabs.name: Archer
tabs.note:
Put 1 point into the active skills, then max "High Polymer Limbs". 
 Put 15 points into "Veins of the Infernal". 
 *1 = Excess points can be used to level "Have Another".

tabs.name: Hunter
tabs.note:
Put 1 point into Bear Trap. 30 into "Have Another... Again", then put remaining points into "Looty McShooty".
*20 Excess points can be put into "Have Another... Again"

Hunter.title: Hunter / Active (~70)
Hunter.notes: **430 mana is required to sustain Piercing Arrow, Traps, and UWU Rawr, your main damaging talents.

tabs.name: Calm_Basics
tabs.note:
*1 = Boost STR to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected. 
 Priority is "Gilded Sword" > "Sharpened Axe".  
 *2 = Excess points may be placed into Mana**, then Agi or "Broken Time".

tabs.name: Archer
tabs.note: Put 1 point into the active skills, then max "High Polymer Limbs" followed by 40 points into "Have Another". The remaining points go to "Veins of the Infernal".

tabs.name: Hunter
tabs.note:
Put 1 point into Bear Trap and Uwu Rawrrr. 40 into "Have Another... Again", then get "Looty McShooty" maxed. 
 With 430 mana, uwu rawr can be sustained and points should be put in to better match mob's respawn timer.

Hunter.title: Hunter / Active (~90)

tabs.name: Calm_Basics
tabs.note:
*1 = Boost STR to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected. 
 Max "Gilded Sword" & "Sharpened Axe". 
 *2 = Get 430 **mana to sustain active talents. 
 *3 = Excess points may be placed into preferably Agi, can do HP/Def, or "Broken Time".

tabs.name: Archer
tabs.note:
Level 40 "Piercing Arrow" to be able to hit 3 mobs, and 1 point into kick. Max "High Polymer Limbs" followed by "Have Another" and "Veins of the Infernal".

tabs.note:
Put 30 points into "Bear Trap" for an additional trap placed, 40 into "Have Another... Again", then get "Looty McShooty" maxed. 
 *1 = With 430 mana, uwu rawr can be sustained and points should be put in.

Hunter.title: Hunter / AFK (~50)
Hunter.notes: Active Skills act as a multiplyer to your total dmg for afk.

tabs.name: Calm_Basics

*1 = Boost STR to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected. 
"Idle Shooting" to 50 for 10% AFK gain rate. 
 Priority is "Gilded Sword" > "Sharpened Axe".

tabs.name: Archer
tabs.note: Level "Polymer Limbs" to 50, active damage skills to 25, then value point into "Strafe" and activate it before going offline. Afterwards, level up "Veins of the Infernal" to 50 if you can afford. Raise your Smithing lvl by produceing 2/3x thread.

tabs.name: Hunter
tabs.note:
Level up "360 Noscope" and "Bear Trap" to 30. 
 Then raise "Looty Mcshooty" to 20+.

Hunter.title: Hunter / AFK (~70)
Hunter.notes: Active Skills act as a multiplyer to your total dmg for afk. lvl 25 on all of them should be enough to reach dmg cap. Put more points into attack talents and "Have Another!" if you are using Prayers that increase mob hp.

tabs.name: Calm_Basics

"Idle Shooting" to 50 for 10% AFK gain rate. 
 Priority is then "Gilded Sword" & "Sharpened Axe".

tabs.name: Archer
tabs.note: Equip attack talents in your attack bar and activate "Strafe" before going offline.

tabs.name: Hunter
tabs.note: *1 Excess points may be placed into "Eagle Eye" for Trapping

Hunter.title: Hunter / AFK (~90)
Hunter.notes: Active Skills act as a multiplyer to your total dmg for afk.

tabs.name: Calm_Basics
tabs.note: *1 = Boost STR to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. *1 If you need Survivability.

tabs.name: Archer
tabs.note: Equip attack talents in your attack bar and activate "Strafe" before going offline.

tabs.name: Hunter
tabs.note:
Max "Eagle Eye" for trapping. With a high enough skill lvl and "Poison Froge Vial" you can collect more than 100% critters despite the skill saying otherwise. 
 Excess points can be placed into "Previous Points".

Hunter.title: Hunter / AFK (~170)
Hunter.notes: Active Skills act as a multiplyer to your total dmg for afk. Put more points into attack talents and "Have Another!" if you are using Prayers that increase mob hp.

tabs.name: Calm_Basics
tabs.note:
*1 = Boost STR to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. *1 If you got enough points and do not wish to change presets when placing traps. 
 *2 assign points here if you wish to use no healing food during afk. 50 in "Bucklered Up" are enoguh rest into Hp.

tabs.name: Archer
tabs.note: *1 Max this and Hp from tab 1 if you wish to "No food". *2 Max these two if you can afford it. They are needed to lvl Smithing for "Vines of the Infernal"

tabs.name: Hunter
tabs.note:
Max "Eagle Eye" for trapping. With a high enough skill lvl and "Poison Froge Vial" you can collect more than 100% critters despite the skill saying otherwise. 
 *1 If you got enough points and do not wish to change presets when placing traps.

Hunter.title: Rams active hunter 150+
Hunter.notes: 1* - boosted only if there's problems with survi. 2*- you need ~540 mana to sustain your skills. 3*-puttin 20 into 2nd/3rd arrow each would be good enough 4*-you can decide if you want more ms/crit for active or away gains talent to not loose as much when youre not actively farming

tabs.name: Savvy_Basics
tabs.note: Place points into Smart Efficiency, and then Active AFK'er. Excess points can be used to max Smart Efficiency.

tabs.name: Mage
tabs.note:
Place points into Logs on Logs and Deforesting All Doubt.
*15 If you have lots of leaves, some points may be played into Leaf Theif

Mage.title: Mage / Active (~35)
Mage.notes: That's how your build should roughly look when pushing for subclass.

tabs.name: Savvy_Basics
tabs.note:
*1 = As much as you need to reach the farthest monster zone. Your goal is to reach Crabcakes to choose your subclass. For gaining levels, Sticks is a great farming zone.
After improving Accuracy prioritise "Sharpened axe" > "Gilded Sword" > "Overclocked Energy"

tabs.name: Mage
tabs.note:
Put 1 points into each active skill then max "Power Overwhelming".
*1 = Excess points can be evenly split between "Knowledge is Power" and "Individual Insight".

tabs.name: Savvy_Basics

After improving Accuracy prioritise "Sharpened axe" > "Gilded Sword" > "Overclocked Energy"

tabs.note: Level "Power Overwhelming" to 50, then your active damage skills to 25. Excess points can be used to level "Power Overwhelming" past 50

Place points into Smart Efficiency, and then Active AFK'er.
*1 Excess points can be placed into WIS.

Place points into Logs on Logs. Split points evenely between Leaf Thief and Deforesting All Doubt.
*1 Excess points can go into Individual Insight

Earlier Education.
*1 Excess points go into Stupendous Statues.

tabs.name: Shaman
tabs.note: 12>13(only if you still need alchemy xp on shaman)>14>8>9

tabs.name: Savvy_Basics
tabs.note:
*1 = Boost AGI to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected.
After improving Accuracy prioritise "Overclocked Energy" > "Gilded Sword" > "Sharpened Axe"

tabs.name: Mage
tabs.note:
Put 1 points into each active skill then max "Power Overwhelming".
*1 = Spread excess points equally between "Knowledge is Power" and "Individual Insight".

tabs.name: Shaman
tabs.note:
Put 1 point in every active skill, then 100 into "Earlier Education".
If you are having trouble with mana, un-equip "Sizzling Skull" due to its low cooldown and high mana cost. Also "Crazy Concoctions" only works if you're actively clicking on the screen to aim it.
*1 = Excess points can be used to level active skills.
*2 = If you have many Green Vials, you can place 20-30 points into "Virile Vials".

tabs.name: Savvy_Basics
tabs.note:
*1 = Boost AGI to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected.
After improving Accuracy prioritise "Overclocked Energy" > "Gilded Sword" > "Sharpened Axe"
*2 = Excess points into WIS for damage and faster brew speed.

tabs.name: Mage
tabs.note:
Put 1 points into each active skill then max "Power Overwhelming".
*1 = Spread excess points equally between "Knowledge is Power" and "Individual Insight"

tabs.name: Shaman
tabs.note:
Put 1 point in every active skill, then 100 into "Earlier Education".
If you are having trouble with mana, un-equip "Sizzling Skull" due to its low cooldown and high mana cost. Also "Crazy Concoctions" only works if you're actively clicking on the screen to aim it.
*1 = Excess points can be used to level active skills. Note that "Auspicious Aura" increases in size every 35 points. This can be useful for boss fights/colosseum.
*2 = If you have many Green Vials, you can put points into "Virile Vials".

Shaman.title: Shaman / Active C.Amarok Killer (~90)
Shaman.notes:
FMJ Bullet, Midnight Cookie, Golden Kebabs, and Golden Nomwich if you are not afraid to step away and swap to healing food as needed. A single properly used crazy concoctions can one shot Chaotic Amarok in combination with your auto attack. Perfect vial usage is 350 ms (.35 seconds) then release for damage vial, if fast enough you can throw 4 vials making this fight very easy.
100+ = Checkout books for these talents from the library.

tabs.name: Savvy_Basics
tabs.note:
*1 = Boost AGI to have 2.6k+ accuracy AFTER accuracy cards are equipped.
 2* = After maxing the damage talents, place excess points into "Farsight".
3* = If you have maxed Farsight, the rest of the points can go into mana.

tabs.name: Mage
tabs.note:
Put 1 points into each active skill then max "Power Overwhelming", "Knowledge is Power" and "Individual Insight". Afterwards, put 50 points into "You're Next"
*1 = Extra points can be placed into mana.

tabs.name: Shaman
tabs.note:
Put 1 point in every active skill. Max "Virile Vials", this will be a huge source of damage. For burst damage, max "Crazy Concoctions".
*1 = You can put some points into "Earlier Education" if you're lacking points on Tab 2.
*2 = Excess points can be used to improve skills. Note that "Auspicious Aura" increases in size every 35 points.

Shaman.notes: Active Skills act as a multiplyer to your total dmg for afk.

*1 = Boost AGI to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected.
"Idle Casting" to 50 for 10% AFK gain rate.

tabs.note: Level "Power Overwhelming" to 60, then your active damage skills. Excess points can be used to level "Power Overwhelming" past 60.

tabs.name: Shaman
tabs.note:
Level the damage skills evenly.
*1 = If you have many Green Vials, you can place 20+ points into "Virile Vials" for more damage.
*2 = You can put some points into "Earlier Education" if you're lacking points on Tab 2.

Level "Power Overwhelming" to 100, then 25 to Fireball and Energy Bolt.

Shaman.title: Shaman / AFK (~90)
Shaman.notes: 100+ = Checkout books for these talents from the library.

tabs.name: Savvy_Basics
tabs.note:
*1 = Boost AGI to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected.
"Idle Casting" to 100 for 13% AFK gain rate.
Priority switches to "Overclocked Energy" > "Gilded Sword" > "Sharpened Axe"

If you are not AFK damage capped, you can add more points into "Energy Bolt" and "Mini Fireball" until you hit cap.

Place points into "Virile Vials".
*1 = You can put some points into "Earlier Education" if you're lacking points on Tab 2.

tabs.name: Shaman
tabs.note: 12>13(only if you still need alchemy xp on shaman)>14>8>9

Shaman.title: Shaman / AFK (~150)
Shaman.notes:
After reaching 100 WIS your brewspeed is reduced until you hit 1300+ WIS. 
 Active Skills act as a multiplyer to your total dmg for afk. 
 lvl 25 on all of them should be enough to reach dmg cap. Put more points into attack talents if you are using Prayers that increase mob hp.

tabs.name: Savvy_Basics
tabs.note: *1 Put points into talents for Survivablility. Quickness Boots for accuracy.

tabs.name: Mage
tabs.note:
Put points into Free Meal to reduce food consumption. 
*1 Chopping it up Ez is a has bad scaling, 25 points are enough.

tabs.name: Shaman
tabs.note:
Talents 12, 13  and 14 to boost your alchemy.
*1 Excess points go into Stupendous Statues. 
 Wis Wumbo is needed to reach lvl 260 on first tab talent Book of the wise.

Shaman.title: Shaman / COLO (100+)
Shaman.notes:
Auspicious Aura and Tenteyecle are the most important talents for this build. 
 Crazy Concoctions can be used while you walk. Tab on a spot and drop it while running past mobs. 
 Mini Fireball and Sizzling Skull can be used to clear up mobs that you missed. 
 To get the best scores you need 3x speed potions and Crows Nest. Only use Crows Nest if you got enough DMG.

tabs.name: Savvy_Basics
tabs.note: Quickness Boots for accuracy, you need enough to hit the strongest mob. Missing on mobs will screw over your cooldowns.

tabs.name: Mage
tabs.note: Put unused points into WIS talents.

tabs.name: Shaman
tabs.note:
Auspicious Aura needs to be atleast lvl 105, 140 would be best. Tenteyecle resets the cd of your skills on kills, you need to have this talent. 
 *1 Put addional points here for Alchemy gains. Activate it when you start killing.

tabs.name: Savvy_Basics
tabs.note:
Place points into Smart Efficiency, and then Active AFK'er.
*1 Excess points can be placed into WIS.

tabs.name: Mage

Place points into Logs on Logs. Split points evenely between Leaf Thief and Deforesting All Doubt.
*1 Excess points can go into Individual Insight

tabs.name: Wizard

Earlier Education.
*1 Excess points go into Staring Statues.

Wizard.notes: skipping xp talents cause you usually dont have any need for xp when you decide to make hybrid build

tabs.name: Savvy_Basics
tabs.note:
*1 = Boost AGI to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected.
After improving Accuracy prioritise "Overclocked Energy" > "Gilded Sword" > "Sharpened Axe"

tabs.name: Mage
tabs.note:
Put 1 points into each active skill then max "Power Overwhelming".
*1 = Spread excess points equally between "Knowledge is Power" and "Individual Insight".

tabs.name: Wizard
tabs.note:
Put 1 point in every active skill, then 100 into "Earlier Education". Be sure to place points into "Paperwork Great..." for a nice damage boost.
*1 = Excess points can be used to level active skills.

tabs.name: Savvy_Basics
tabs.note:
*1 = Boost AGI to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected.
After improving Accuracy prioritise "Overclocked Energy" > "Gilded Sword" > "Sharpened Axe"
*2 = Excess points into WIS for damage and worship EXP.

tabs.name: Mage
tabs.note:
Put 1 points into each active skill then max "Power Overwhelming".
*1 = Spread excess points equally between "Knowledge is Power" and "Individual Insight"

tabs.name: Wizard
tabs.note:
Put 1 point in every active skill, then 100 into "Earlier Education". Be sure to place points into "Paperwork Great..." for a nice damage boost.
*1 = Excess points can be used to level active skills.

Wizard.title: Wizard / AFK (~50)
Wizard.notes: Active Skills act as a multiplyer to your total dmg for afk.

tabs.name: Savvy_Basics
tabs.note:
*1 = Boost AGI to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected.
"Idle Casting" to 50 for 10% AFK gain rate.
Priority switches to "Overclocked Energy" > "Gilded Sword" > "Sharpened axe"

tabs.name: Mage
tabs.note: *1 Max "Knowledge is Power" and then "Individual Insight".

tabs.name: Wizard
tabs.note:
Level the damage skills evenly. Be sure to place points into "Paperwork Great..." for a nice damage boost.
*1 = You can put some points into "Earlier Education" if you're lacking points on Tab 2.

Wizard.title: Wizard / AFK (~70)
Wizard.notes: Active Skills directly increase AFK kills/hr.

tabs.name: Savvy_Basics
tabs.note:
*1 = Boost AGI to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected.
"Idle Casting" to 50 for 10% AFK gain rate.
Priority switches to "Overclocked Energy" > "Gilded Sword" > "Sharpened Axe"

tabs.name: Mage
tabs.note: *1 Max "Knowledge is Power" and then "Individual Insight". *2 If excess points go here.

tabs.name: Wizard
tabs.note:
Be sure to place 30+ points into "Paperwork Great..." for a nice damage boost.
*1 = You can put some points into "Earlier Education" if you're lacking points on Tab 2.

Wizard.title: Wizard / AFK (~90)
Wizard.notes: 100+ = Checkout books for these talents from the library.

tabs.name: Savvy_Basics
tabs.note:
*1 = Boost AGI to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected.
"Idle Casting" to 100 for 13% AFK gain rate.
Priority switches to "Overclocked Energy" > "Gilded Sword" > "Sharpened Axe"
*2 = Excess points into WIS for more damage and worship EXP.

tabs.name: Mage
tabs.note: *1 Max "Knowledge is Power" and then "Individual Insight". *2 If excess points go here.

tabs.name: Wizard
tabs.note:
Level the active skills to 25. Be sure to place 50+ points into "Paperwork Great..." for a nice damage boost.
*1 = You can put some points into "Earlier Education" if you're lacking points on Tab 2.
 *2 = If you have capped your damage, excess points can go into worship talents. This build does not prominently focus on worship, and so you are likely to only have enough talent points to level "Charge Syphon". It may be a good idea to add 1 point into "Charge Syphon" to make gathering souls easier.

Wizard.title: Wizard / AFK / WOR (170)
Wizard.notes:
Active Skills act as a multiplyer to your total dmg for afk. lvl 25 on all of them should be enough to reach dmg cap. Put more points into attack talents if you are using Prayers that increase mob hp. 
 To turn this into a regular afk build do not lvl anything related to eff or worship.

tabs.name: Savvy_Basics
tabs.note:
*1 Put points into talents for Survivablility. Quickness Boots for accuracy. 
 *2 This build uses many talent points. If you lack points do not lvl Book of the Wise too high.

tabs.name: Mage
tabs.note:
Put points into Free Meal to reduce food consumption. 
*1 Chopping it up Ez is a has bad scaling, put in a few points and only max it when you have no other use for points.

tabs.name: Wizard
tabs.note:
Lvling Mage is Best bubble for Fuscia Flasks is currently very hard. Do not lvl Fuscia Flasks higher than you can use it. 
 Charge Syphon can be used to boost the worship lvl on your wizard or get more souls per charge, with Prayer nerf and MMan you likely do not want to use this.
